forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 10C. S winds at 25 to 40 km/h, decreasing to 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High near 50F. S winds at 15 to 25 mph, decreasing to 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind. Low 8C. Winds SW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. Low 46F. Winds SW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High around 10C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 49F. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 36F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 9C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 49F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low near 5C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low near 40F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. High 8C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 47F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 4C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 38F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 7C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 44F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low near 35F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 43F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 34F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 33F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High 41F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.
